response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with high-quality materials. This product is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled value. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than what many would pay, but we're looking to make this deal work for everyone involved. Considering its market value and the benefits it provides, I'm extending an offer to sell it to you for $125. This price allows us to cover our costs while still providing you with a great deal. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further.", "product_price": 125}
